FuncDef: This command configures the value of the IPv4-MTU PCO sent in S11 GTP messages. This is the MTU a device should honor when sending data toward the SGW/PGW. For IPv6, this value is signaled in the RA message and which can be configured in thegroup-interface> ipv6>router-advertisements>mtucontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the MTU value in bytes. Values-512 to 9000.
